professionalSummary: Data Specialist with 5+ years of experience building data systems, pipelines, dashboards, and automation workflows across research and analytics. Skilled in Python, SQL, cloud deployment, dbt, statistical modeling, and LLM‑powered automation. Recently expanded into sports analytics with daily data‑driven cricket articles and visual insights at Cricket Gardens.

experience.title: Data Specialist
experience.company: International Maize and Wheat Improvement Centre (CIMMYT)
responsibilities: Designed and implemented automated pipelines to collect field data using KoboToolbox and push cleaned data to interactive dashboards (Dash, Power BI, Looker Studio, Tableau)
Developed standardized data management protocols to improve accuracy, reproducibility, and efficiency
Built data transformation workflows using SQL and dbt
Used Linux and Bash scripting to automate ingestion and reporting
Leveraged Git and GitHub Actions for version control and automation
Integrated Hugging Face and OpenAI APIs for NLP-related analysis
Leading a wheat disease monitoring pipeline for yellow rust tracking

experience.title: Data Manager
responsibilities: Managed data operations for research projects using Python, R, and ODK
Built custom scripts and dashboards for monitoring and evaluation

certifications.name: Introduction to Data Science in Python
Applied Plotting, Charting & Data Representation in Python

publications.title: The optimization of conservation agriculture practices requires attention to location-specific performance

projects.title: Cricket Analytics
projects.description: Analysis of cricket player performance using data scraping and visualization techniques

projects.title: Wheat Disease Monitoring Pipeline
projects.description: Ongoing system using LLMs and custom data pipelines for rust outbreak tracking

projects.title: Groundwater Monitoring Dashboard
